channel.title: Amazing new server!
channel.description:
Hey guys All go to cooperax.com for an amazing server, Its growing by the second so dont miss out and join in the fun. Theres amazing frendly staff , and heaps of great features, Slayer Many many minigames, Custom dung that WORKS. So give it a go ! HAVE FUN GUYS !!!!! www.cooperax.com
All dungeoneering items. Great up-time. VBulletin Forums. Friendly and helpful staff. A helpdesk for all those in need. 3 awesome donator ranks. A big donator point shop. Loads of bosses. Torva, Pernix and Virtus armour. Small yet welcoming community. Regular drop parties and Hide 'n' Seeks. Awesome Rep feature on forums. A refferal system which gives you cash for bringing someone onto the server. Amazing donator zones. Coloured and custom loyalty titles. One-of-a-kind staff crowns. Regular player and donator content updates. Working Dragon Claws spec. All working curses with emotes and effects. 100% Dicing using a dice bag. Can be clan rolled, public rolled or private rolled. All working skills and custom dungeoneering.
Cooperax.com
